markdown:
**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 204
  • Change the [human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) trait to [elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58).
  • Add [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4) to the NPC's languages.
  • Add [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416).
  • Increase the NPC's Speed by 5 feet.
name: Elf
